          <language>sv</language>
          <title>
            <string language="sv">Kemisk reaktionshastighet (Modul 2 - Kemi B)</string>
            <string language="en">Chemical reaktionshastighet (module 2 - chemistry B)</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Chemisches reaktionshastighet (Modul 2 - Chemie 
B)</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Reaktionshastighet chimique (module 2 - chimie 
B)</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Reaktionshastighet químico (módulo 2 - chemistry
B)</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Reaktionshastighet chimico (modulo 2 - chimica B)</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Χημικό reaktionshastighet (ενότητα 2 - χημεία Β)</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Reaktionshastighet químico (módulo 2 - química
B)</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="sv">Kemister frågar sig ofta hur kemiska reaktioner kan påskyndas. Detta är betydelsefullt till exempel för att göra en kemisk tillverkningsprocess lönsam.</string>
            <string language="en">Chemists ask itself often how chemical reaktioner can be accelerated. This is important for example in order to do a chemical production process profitable.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sv">Kemi B</string>
            <string language="sv">kemi</string>
            <string language="sv">kemisk reaktionshastighet</string>
            <string language="sv">mikroorganism</string>
            <string language="sv">mikroorganismer</string>
            <string language="sv">kompostering</string>
            <string language="sv">nedbrytning</string>
            <string language="en">Chemistry B</string>
            <string language="en">chemistry</string>
            <string language="en">chemical reaktionshastighet</string>
            <string language="en">microwave oven organism</string>
            <string language="en">microwave oven organisms</string>
            <string language="en">kompostering</string>
            <string language="en">disintegration</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>hierarchical</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Chemiker fragen sich häufig, wie chemisches 
reaktioner beschleunigt werden kann. Dieses ist wichtig zum 
Beispiel, um einen chemischen rentablen Produktion Prozeß zu tun.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Les chimistes se demandent souvent comment le 
reaktioner chimique peut être accéléré. C'est important par 
exemple afin de faire un procédé de production chimique profitable.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Os químicos perguntam-se frequentemente como o 
reaktioner químico pode ser acelerado. Isto é importante para 
o exemplo a fim fazer um processo de produção químico profitable.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">I chimici si chiedono spesso come il reaktioner 
chimico può essere accelerato. Ciò è importante per esempio 
per fare un processo di produzione chimico vantaggioso.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Οι φαρμακοποιοί αναρωτιούνται συχνά πώς το χημικό 
reaktioner μπορεί να επιταχυνθεί. Αυτό είναι σημαντικό 
παραδείγματος χάριν προκειμένου να γίνει μια χημική διαδικασία 
παραγωγής κερδοφόρα.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Los químicos se preguntan a menudo cómo el 
reaktioner químico puede ser acelerado. Esto es importante por 
ejemplo para hacer un proceso de producción químico provechoso.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Chemie B</string>
          </keyword>
